titleStmt.title: The Quakers looking-glass look'd upon; and turned toward himself; in a sober reply to an uncivll [sic] pamplet published by Luke Howard a Quaker, against a narrative formerly published, setting forth the folly and presumption of Charles Baily a Quaker, sometimes a prisoner in Dover ...
titleStmt.author: Hobbs, Richard, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Smith at the Elephant and Castle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
